subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: A crowd of about 900 people gathered in Kei Nishikori’s hometown in Japan at 6 a.m. to watch him in the U.S. Open final, and they expressed pride despite his loss.
snippet: A crowd of about 900 people gathered in Kei Nishikori’s hometown in Japan at 6 a.m. to watch him in the U.S. Open final, and they expressed pride despite his loss.
